data.title: New party concept La Farandula heads to Privilege Ibiza for a 9-week residency
data.meta_description: Privilege Ibiza is getting a new part concept, La Farandula, which will take place from tomorrow until Saturday 23rd September. The new party concept — which is inspired by Salvidor Dali's surrealism — promises "art, brain-stimulating music, avant-garde performances, additive-free surrealism and, especially, respect for the Farandula tradition." Confirmed to play the opening party tomorrow are Luca Donzelli, DeWalta and Cristian Vivano, with the organisers promising a host of special guests throughout the 9-week run of parties.
data.text:
Privilege Ibiza is getting a new part concept, La Farandula, which will take place from tomorrow until Saturday 23rd September.

The new party concept — which is inspired by Salvidor Dali's surrealism — promises "art, brain-stimulating music, avant-garde performances, additive-free surrealism and, especially, respect for the Farandula tradition."

Confirmed to play the opening party tomorrow are Luca Donzelli, DeWalta and Cristian Vivano, with the organisers promising a host of special guests throughout the 9-week run of parties.

The brainchild of a group of friends with 20 years of experience, they're looking to recreate the freedom and creativity that turned a small mediterranean island into the centre of the electronic music universe.

Each week, the club's Gallery will be transformed with specially created works of art, which will be on sale for anyone who falls in love with them.

There will also be actors and performers from The Comic Group together with the Show Gogo by Las Pajitas Faranduleras who will add an extra bit of spice to the shows.

For tickets and more info head here.
